snippet: Orders increased 2.1 percent after seven monthly declines, the Commerce Department reported Monday
abstract: Commerce Dept reports United States factories orders rose 2.1 percent in March after seven monthly declines.
lead_paragraph: Orders increased 2.1 percent after seven monthly declines, the Commerce Department reported Monday

headline.main: Factory Report Shows Increase in Orders and Investment
headline.print_headline: Factory Orders Increase for First Time Since July, and Forecasts See a Rebound in Growth
